name: Earth Watcher
description:
Earth Watcher.

 The only one who can keep people from nuclear hell for as long as possible.

Controlls:
  •  Mouse
How to play:
  • Click & drag to fly around
  • Сlick on the emblems that fall on the planet to get new cards
  • Drag & drop the cards on the planet to affect the level of aggression of both factions. The upper number on the card indicates the affection on the aggression of the faction whose emblem is depicted on the map. Bottom - affection on the other.
THE LOWER AGRESSION LEVEL THE BETTER
